content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
If I had to choose between King Chang and Agassi Gopchang, I would choose this place! Practically no wait and the quality of the food was really goodWe did a combo set for intestines and did gopchang and daechang. This combo came with side dishes and a choice of Korean stew.Highly suggest you visit this place if you're in town!
